value:
$nMPID_プルメリア味方|Loitering at the beach in nothing but
these flimsy clothes... Mortals truly
are utterly shameless.

$nMPID_双界シーダ|Talys is an island kingdom, so I grew
up surrounded by the ocean. I'd love
to show it to everyone someday!

$nMPID_プルメリア味方|We dökkálfar are...unaccustomed to
blue skies, but Princess Caeda...
She encouraged me to give it a try.

$nMPID_双界シーダ|Isn't Plumeria's swimsuit lovely?
It suits her perfectly!

$nMPID_プルメリア味方|Princess Caeda's words carry no
falsehoods. Indeed, everything she
says comes right from the heart.

$nMPID_双界シーダ|We come bearing summer greetings.
Plumeria, come on! You know
$Nf said to say hi!

$nMPID_双界シーダ|All right, Plumeria, let's enjoy all the
fun summer has to offer!

$nMPID_プルメリア味方|I will do my best to live up to
Princess Caeda's expectations...

$nMPID_プルメリア味方|Ah...this view is everything I could
ever ask for. The allure of the beach
is a dangerous thing indeed...

$nMPID_双界シーダ|Oh, thank you so much! ...Plumeria,
you seem wary about this. Don't
worry, I'm not going anywhere.

I'm Caeda, princess of Talys.
Plumeria and I are here to create
some wonderful summer memories!

$nMPID_プルメリア味方|Princess Caeda... Are you really not
frightened of me? I am a dökkálfr.
By my own hands, mortals have...$k$p$nMPID_双界シーダ|I think we all have things we regret.
And even if I don't understand your
past, your powers, or your pain...$k$pYour eyes tell me that your heart is
still gentle—that you are still kind.
You are very dear to me, Plumeria.$k$p$nMPID_プルメリア味方|But...is that really enough for you to
trust me? Even though I have led
countless mortal hearts astray?$k$p...Even though I have never once
been loved? You would still think
so much of me, despite that?$k$p$nMPID_双界シーダ|Of course! And whenever summer
arrives, I will fondly remember
these days we spent together.$k$p$nMPID_プルメリア味方|Thank you, Princess Caeda. I will
also cherish our time together...
This fleeting dream of summer.
たあっ
You are sunk!
きゃああっ
Water is cold...!
You'll get wet...!
$nMPID_二人|Take the plunge!
$nMPID_二人|Do you believe... In love?
$nMPID_双界シーダ|Aquatic attack!
$nMPID_プルメリア味方|Stop thinking what you're thinking!
The wave crashed...
Be careful in the water.
Do your best.
"Let's swim!" "If you insist..."
"You enjoy this...grit?" "You mean the beach? Yes!"
giggle
"Thirsty?" "Never you mind."
I feel your gaze.
This'll be fun!
Eyes on the battle.

$nMPID_双界シーダ|Plumeria, I've heard that your people
have the power to grant dreams...

Would...would you consider giving
me a dream?

$nMPID_プルメリア味方|What?! You? Do you...know what kind
of dreams I deal in?

$nMPID_双界シーダ|Well, no, to be honest. I was just
hoping you could give me a dream
where I have wings like yours.

Flying under your own power like
that... It just seems like it would
feel so good.

$nMPID_プルメリア味方|Ah. Well, my dreams are...
My dreams are not like that.

You see, the dreams I give are...
especially intense.$k$pIf you aren't used to...such things,
you might not wake up for a long,
long time. Days, even.

Besides, w-we have this beautiful
view of the ocean!$k$pWhat do you need with dreams
when the real world is so lovely?

$nMPID_双界シーダ|Oh, you're right, of course.
Thank you, Plumeria.

It means a lot to have you looking
out for me like that.

I'm so glad we became friends.
You're like my personal
guardian angel!
$nMPID_プルメリア味方|...A-angel?

I had heard you had a silver tongue,
Princess Caeda...

But you will find that I am not subject
to your flattery.

$nMPID_双界シーダ|Flattery? No, Plumeria, I just like
having you as a friend, I swear!

$nMPID_プルメリア味方|You really do, don't you? ...Very well,
friends we shall be.

$nMPID_双界シーダ|Wonderful! In that case, my dear
friend, we can't let this ocean go
to waste! Let's go for a swim.

$nMPID_プルメリア味方|Oh, Princess Caeda... You and
your heart that sees only the
best in people.
